text: Bernhard Cullmann, (born 1 November 1949), nicknamed "Bernd", is a German former footballer who played as a midfielder and sometimes as a defender. ==Honours== 1\. FC Köln * Bundesliga: 1977–78 * DFB-Pokal: 1976–77, 1977–78, 1982–83 West Germany * World Cup: 1974 * European Championship: 1980 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:German football managers Category:1974 FIFA World Cup players Category:1978 FIFA World Cup players
title: Bernhard Cullmann
